i1.name: Get Excited!
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Whenever an enemy [[champion]], [[Monster|epic monster]], [[turret]] or [[inhibitor]] dies within 3 seconds of being damaged by '''Jinx''', she gains {{sti|ms|{{as|175% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} which decays over 6 seconds.
Additionally, she gains {{sti|{{as|15% '''total''' attack speed}}}} and removes the attack speed cap for the same duration.

q1.name: Switcheroo!
description: {{sbc|{{cci|Pow-Pow.png|Jinx#Pow-Pow|Pow-Pow}} - Passive:}} '''Jinx's''' [[basic attack]]s make her ''{{ai|Rev'd up}}'' for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, granting {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, stacking up to 3 times.

{{sbc|{{cci|Fishbones.png|Jinx#Fishbones|Fishbones}} - Toggle:}} '''Jinx''' loses {{sti|{{as|25% of her '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and her basic attacks cost {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} [[on-attack]]. They gain {{sti|range|'''bonus''' range}}, deal {{as|10% AD}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}, and hit all enemies near the main target. The bonus damage from ''Fishbones'' is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.

The first ''Rev'd up'' stack is twice as potent as the others, and stacks decay one at a time when she stops attacking. ''Fishbones'' will not refresh the stack timer and only its first basic attack after using ''Switcheroo!'' will gain the bonus attack speed.
q1.notes:
* {{ai|Pow-Pow||''Pow-Pow''}} applies {{tip|basic damage}} and {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}} deals {{tip|proc damage}} to the primary target and {{tip|area damage}} to all other targets.
* '''Jinx's''' first attack after switching to {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}} can be triggered after {{fd|0.4}} seconds, instead of using the attack timer.
* Toggling ''Switcheroo!'' is '''not''' considered an activation for the purposes of {{sbc|{{nie|Spellblade}}}}.
* Despite '''Jinx''' starting the game using {{ai|Pow-Pow||''Pow-Pow''}} she doesn't receive any bonus attack speed until ''Switcheroo!'' is unlocked.
* {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}} splash damage affects structures (minions will target '''Jinx''') but does not affect targets if '''Jinx's''' attacks are {{ai|Spirit's Refuge|Shen|blocked}}, {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, or if they {{tip|blind|miss}}.
* With {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} {{ai|Pow-Pow||''Pow-Pow''}} generates one stack per enemy hit.
* Both weapons apply [[on-hit effect]]s (the splash damage of ''{{ai|Fishbones}}'' does not) and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}}. {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones's ''}}bonus damage also applies {{sti|life steal}}.
* Each of {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} additional bolts apply {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones' ''}}splash damage, which stacks with each other.
** Damage for {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}}: {{as|110% AD}} (100% + 10%).
** Critical strike damage for {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}}: {{as|220% AD}} ((100% + 10%){{times}}2).
** Critical strike damage for {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}} with {{ii|Infinity Edge}}: {{as|247.5% AD}} ((100% + 10%){{times}}2.25).
** Damage per {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}} {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane|bolt}}: {{as|44% AD}} ((100% + 10%){{times}}{{ii|Runaan's Hurricane|{{fd|0.4}}}}).
** Critical strike damage per {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}} {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane|bolt}}: {{as|88% AD}} (((100% + 10%){{times}}{{ii|Runaan's Hurricane|{{fd|0.4}}}}){{times}}2).
** Critical strike damage per {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}} {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane|bolt}} with {{ii|Infinity Edge}}: {{as|99% AD}} (((100% + 10%){{times}}{{ii|Runaan's Hurricane|{{fd|0.4}}}}){{times}}2.25).
** Potential damage on stacked enemies with {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}} and {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}}: {{as|198% AD}} (110% + 44% + 44%).
** Potential critical strike damage on stacked enemies with {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}} and {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}}: {{as|396% AD}} (220% + 88% + 88%).
** Potential critical strike damage on stacked enemies with {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}}, {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}}, and {{ii|Infinity Edge}}: {{as|445.5% AD}} ((247.5% + 99% + 99%)).

w1.name: Zap!
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After {{pp|11|0.6 to 0.4|0 to 250|key1=%|type='''bonus''' attack speed|color=attack speed}} seconds, '''Jinx''' fires a shock blast that deals {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy it hits, {{tip|sight|revealing}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds.

e1.name: Flame Chompers!
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jinx''' tosses out 3 Chompers that arm after {{fd|0.7}} seconds and explode after 5 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} over {{fd|1.5}} seconds to all enemies within a small area.

''Chompers'' prematurely explode on {{tip|champion|enemy champion}} contact, {{tip|knockdown|knocking down}} and {{tip|root|rooting}} them for the same duration. A champion can set off only a single Chomper and be damaged by one.
e1.notes:
* Casting ''Flame Chompers!'' will not interrupt '''Jinx's''' orders.
* This ability casts perpendicular to '''Jinx's''' location.
* ''Chompers'' will halt when encountering {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}}.

r1.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jinx''' fires a [[File:Super Mega Death Rocket! Minimap.png|20px|link=]] rocket in the target direction that explodes upon enemy champion contact, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to them and 80% of the amount to nearby enemies as well as granting brief {{tip|sight}} of its surroundings.

The rocket deals {{pp|16|type=distance traveled|key=%|10 to 100|0 to 1500|formula=10% (+6% per 100 units travelled). The damage increase is capped at 1500 units.}} of its damage based on distance traveled, though the {{as|'''missing''' health}} component is unaffected.
r1.notes: * {{tip|Spell Shield}} will block the impact damage, but will not prevent the explosion.
